scripts.bump:pre: npm run bump:npm:pre && npm run bump:dotnet:pre
scripts.bump:patch: npm run bump:npm:patch && npm run bump:dotnet:patch
scripts.bump:feature: npm run bump:npm:feature && npm run bump:dotnet:feature
scripts.bump:breaking: npm run bump:npm:breaking && npm run bump:dotnet:breaking
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:clean && npm run build:prod:win && npm run build:prod:linux && npm run build:prod:osx
scripts.build:bundle: npm run build:clean && npm run build:bundle:win && npm run build:bundle:linux && npm run build:bundle:osx
scripts.publish: cd npm && npm publish --tag next && cd ..
scripts.publish:live: cd npm && npm publish --tag latest && cd ..
scripts.bump:npm:pre: cd npm && npm version prerelease --no-git-tag-version && cd ..
scripts.bump:npm:patch: cd npm && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && cd ..
scripts.bump:npm:feature: cd npm && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && cd ..
scripts.bump:npm:breaking: cd npm && npm version major --no-git-tag-version && cd ..
